resource_description: Old pharmacy, should be something useful in here.
An abandonned guard station.
Scrap yard, looks picked clean.
Might see some game, but probably not.
Mushrooms and wild fruits abound.
The old quarry equipment is a good source of scrap metal.
Used to be a lumbermill, pretty empty now.
Old apple orchard, still growing.
Deer frequent this area.
"Secret" fishing spot.
Since the settlers first came here people have been hunting in this land.
An abandonned construction site.
The army surplus store.
Small game is plentiful in this area.
Wildflowers and herbs are common here.
The old mill has wild wheat growing around it.
Fur trappers used to set up here.
Edible cattails and wild rice can be found here.
The old army base.
Scrapyard, looks promising.
